PROJECT(NIFTIIOLIB)

SET(NIFTIIOLIB_SRC nifti1_io.c)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${ZNZLIB_SOURCE_DIR})

ADD_LIBRARY(niftiio ${NIFTIIOLIB_SRC} )
INSTALL_TARGETS(/lib niftiio)
INSTALL_FILES(/include "(\\.h)$")
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( niftiio znz )
